modal.title: Connect Wallet
modal.note: By connecting your wallet, you consent to the Wildcat Privacy Policy.

inviteBorrower.title: Invite New Borrower
inviteBorrower.description: Enter borrower's details to send them an invitation.

loading.title: Sending Invitation...
loading.subtitle: This may take a few seconds.

success.title: Invitation Sent
success.subtitle: The invitation has been sent to the borrower.

error.title: Oops! Something went wrong!
error.subtitle: An error occurred while sending the invitation.

cancelInvite.title: Cancel Invitation
cancelInvite.description: Are you sure you want to cancel the invitation for {{name}} ({{address}})? This action cannot be undone.

markets.title: Markets
markets.lenderSubtitle: All markets you have a position in or are potentially eligible for.

noMarkets.wrongNetwork: No Wildcat Markets On This Network

lenderAlert.title: No active markets
lenderAlert.subtitle: You don’t have any active markets now. See the Other Markets list to join one.

active.title: No Active Markets.
active.borrowerSubtitle: Create a new market, or check your terminated ones.
active.lenderSubtitle: Join a suitable self-onboarding market, or reach out to a borrower (see their profile) for access to restricted ones.

closed.title: No Terminated Market Positions
closed.subtitle: Either your markets are still open, or you haven't deposited into one yet.

noMarkets.wrongNetwork: No Wildcat Markets On This Network

active.title: No Active Markets.
active.subtitle: Create a new market, or check your terminated ones.

terminated.title: You don’t have any terminated markets
terminated.subtitle: Have you got any active markets?

tooltip.willBeDelinquent: This market has become delinquent since its last update, and its delinquency timer will begin to increase when next updated.
tooltip.delinquencyFeesApply: This market is not currently delinquent, but delinquency fees still apply until the timer is below the grace period.
tooltip.hasBecomeHealthy: This market has become healthy, and its delinquency timer will begin to decrease once it is updated.
tooltip.delinquencyContinues: The delinquency timer will continue to increase until this market is returned to a healthy state.

toRepay.title: To Be Repaid
toRepay.tooltip: The sum of all borrowed funds plus accrued interest/fees that a borrower must return to the market.

toBorrow.title: Available To Borrow
toBorrow.tooltip: The portion of the market borrowing capacity that is still available for use.

OpenTerm.tooltip: Withdrawal requests are possible at any time.

FixedTerm.tooltip: Withdrawal requests are possible only after a fixed maturity date.

na.tooltip: Market is Open Term, market can be terminated at any time.

no.tooltip: Market can only be terminated after fixed duration maturity.

yes.tooltip: Borrower can elect to terminate the market at any time.

na.tooltip: No maturity to reduce in an Open Term setting.

no.tooltip: Maturity cannot be shortened from current value.

yes.tooltip: Borrower can elect to shorten Fixed Term duration.

open.tooltip: Anyone can lend to this market.

restricted.tooltip: Lenders must meet specific criteria to lend to this market.
Lenders who have not directly deposited must meet specific criteria to withdraw.

open.tooltip: The market token can be transferred to any non-sanctioned address.

restricted.tooltip: The market token can only be transferred to addresses that meet specific criteria.

disabled.tooltip: The market token cannot be transferred.

authorisedLenders.noLendersSubtitle: Your market doesn't have any onboarded lenders.
authorisedLenders.noActiveLenders: No active lenders yet – you can approve specific addresses in your market policy.

apr.willSetTemporarily: Temporary reserve ratio in force until
apr.approveNotified: I understand that adjusting this APR impacts all lenders.

error.subtitle: Can you reach out to us and tell us how you got here?

success.title: Transaction Successful!
success.subtitle: You can close this window now.

repay.daysSubtitle: Number of additional days to cover interest and fees

statement.title: Transaction History
statement.generate: Generate and download a summary of historic transactions.

terminate.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to terminate this market?
terminate.consequences: Once the market is terminated, you cannot adjust any parameters or borrow further.
terminate.repayRemaining: You need to repay all outstanding debt before/when terminating a market.

fixedTermEndTime.title: Fixed Term Maturity Date [00:00 UTC]
fixedTermEndTime.subtitle: The date after which lenders can request withdrawals.

allowClosureBeforeTerm.title: Allow Early Closure
allowClosureBeforeTerm.subtitle: Allows you to close the market before it reaches maturity.

allowTermReduction.title: Allow Term Reduction
allowTermReduction.subtitle: Allows you to reduce the market's maturity date.

depositAccess.title: Deposit Restrictions
depositAccess.subtitle: Defines access level required for deposits

withdrawalAccess.title: Withdrawal Restrictions
withdrawalAccess.subtitle: Defines access level required for withdrawals

disableTransfers.title: Disable Transfers
disableTransfers.subtitle: Disables transfers of the market token

transferRequiresAccess.title: Restrict Transfers
transferRequiresAccess.subtitle: Transfer recipients will need to meet your policy's access requirements

depositRequiresAccess.title: Restrict Deposits
depositRequiresAccess.subtitle: Depositors will need to meet your policy's access requirements

withdrawalRequiresAccess.title: Restrict Withdrawals
withdrawalRequiresAccess.subtitle: Lenders will need to meet your policy's access requirements to request withdrawals

transferAccess.title: Transfer Restrictions
transferAccess.subtitle: Defines access level required for transfers

policy.title: Market Policy
policy.subtitle: Rules defining loan type (open or fixed) and access requirements.
policy.tooltip: Defines the loan type (open or fixed term) and participant approval criteria. Shared across similar markets, with unique settings like loan maturity or transaction restrictions.

marketName.title: Market Name
marketName.placeholder: Use a distinct prefix, such as wldct for Wildcat.

policyName.title: Policy Name
policyName.tooltip: The name of the market’s rule set.

mla.title: Master Loan Agreement
mla.tooltip: A legally binding document that defines the terms, obligations, and penalties for borrowers and lenders in the market.

accessControl.title: Access Controls
accessControl.subtitle: How lenders gain deposit credentials for markets under this policy.
accessControl.tooltip: Determine the way in which would-be lenders can be onboarded to this market.

marketType.title: Market Type
marketType.tooltip: Select the nature of the market: open (lenders can make withdrawal requests at any time) or fixed (withdrawal requests only possible after a fixed maturity date).

marketAsset.title: Underlying Asset
marketAsset.tooltip: The underlying asset refers to the specific ERC-20 token used in the market for lending, borrowing, and repayments. This asset defines the unit of value for all transactions, influencing the risk profile and appeal of participating in the market.

marketTokenName.title: Market Token Name
marketTokenName.subtitle: A descriptive name for the tokens lenders receive, representing their share in the market.
marketTokenName.tooltip: The market token name is the full descriptive title for tokens issued by the market. These tokens are given to lenders when they deposit assets and indicate their claims on the market’s funds, including the principal and interest. For example, a token name like "Wildcat Wrapped Ether" reflects its association with WETH deposits in a specific market named “Wildcat”.

marketTokenSymbol.title: Market Token Symbol
marketTokenSymbol.subtitle: A short identifier, like "xyz" for "xyzWETH", for the tokens lenders receive in the market.
marketTokenSymbol.tooltip: A short identifier, like "xyz" for "xyzWETH", for the tokens lenders receive in the market.

capacity.title: Maximum Borrow Capacity
capacity.subtitle: The maximum amount of the asset you want to borrow. This can be adjusted up or down later.
capacity.tooltip: The maximum limit of funds that borrowers can access in the market.

baseAPR.title: Base APR
baseAPR.tooltip: The fixed annual percentage rate (excluding any protocol fees) that borrowers pay for assets within the market.

penaltyAPR.title: Penalty APR
penaltyAPR.subtitle: An additional interest rate charged if the market remains delinquent—failing to maintain required reserves—after the grace period has elapsed.

ratio.title: Reserve Ratio
ratio.tooltip: A required percentage of market funds that must remain liquid and unavailable for borrowing.

deposit.title: Minimum Deposit
deposit.subtitle: Optional: default value is 0.
deposit.tooltip: The minimum amount of the underlying asset required in a single deposit by a lender.

gracePeriod.title: Grace Period
gracePeriod.tooltip: A buffer period during which a delinquent market—one failing to maintain required reserves—can return to compliance without penalties being imposed.

withdrawalCycle.title: Withdrawal Cycle Duration
withdrawalCycle.tooltip: A fixed period during which withdrawal requests are grouped and processed.

legalInfo.title: Borrowing Entity Legal Information
legalInfo.subtitle: Entity details used to pre-populate template loan agreements for markets you create.

jurisdiction.title: Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.tooltip: The country in which the borrowing entity is incorporated.

nature.title: Legal Nature Of Borrower
nature.tooltip: Select the 'type' of entity that best describes the borrower.

address.title: Address
address.tooltip: Enter the address of the headquarters/place of business of the borrower.

email.title: Email
email.tooltip: Enter a contact email address for the borrower.

confirmation.title: Review Market Details
confirmation.note: Once your market is created, the only adjustable parameters are Base APR and maximum capacity.

error.title: Oops! Something went wrong!
error.message: Can you reach out to us and tell us how you got here?

success.title: Market created!
success.message: Market successfully created: the rest is up to you!

unnamedPolicy.label: Unnamed Policy
unnamedPolicy.subtitle: Please give a unique name to your policy.

policyName.title: Policy Name
policyName.tooltip: A unique name identifying the rules governing a market’s structure and participant eligibility.

confirm.keepInMind: Submitting this change involves an on-chain transaction.

add.atLeastOne: Add this lender to at least one market.

delete.title: Are you sure you want to remove
delete.subtitle: By removing this lender from all markets, you will delete them from your policy.

addLender.title: Add a new lender
addLender.marketsPlaceholder: Add this lender to at least one market.

deleteLender.title: Are you sure you want to remove
deleteLender.subtitle: By removing this lender from all markets, you will delete them from your policy.

borrowerRegistrationChange.onboarded: You have been successfully onboarded as a borrower.
borrowerRegistrationChange.removed: You have been removed as a borrower.

aprDecreaseEnded.description: The APR decrease related min reserve change has ended for {{marketName}}.

borrowerAddedLenderMultiple.description: You have onboarded {{lender}} to multiple markets.

withdrawalExecution.description: A lender has claimed their tokens from {{marketName}}.

withdrawalFailed.description: Withdrawal cycle for {{marketName}} failed to complete.

aprChange.description: The APR for {{marketName}} has been changed from {{oldValue}} to {{newValue}}

capacityChange.description: The capacity for {{marketName}} has been changed from {{oldValue}} to {{newValue}}

deposit.description: A lender has deposited tokens into {{marketName}}

withdrawalRequest.description: A lender has requested a withdrawal from {{marketName}}

statusChangeUnhealthy.description: Market status for {{marketName}} changed to unhealthy.

statusChangeHealthy.description: Market status for {{marketName}} changed to healthy.

lenderRemoved.description: You have been removed as Lender from {{marketName}}

lenderAdded.description: You have been added to {{marketName}} by {{borrower}}

tokensAvailable.description: Assets can now be claimed in {{marketName}}

buttons.mlaNotSet: Borrower Has Not Configured An MLA
buttons.mlaRefused: Borrower Declined to Set An MLA

deposit.title: Available To Deposit
deposit.tooltip: The amount of the underlying asset held by the address you are connected with.

withdraw.title: Available For Withdraw Requests
withdraw.tooltip: The amount of underlying asset debt that the address you are connected with is able to request a withdrawal for. Note that if this market is still in a Fixed Term state (see maturity below), you are unable to make withdrawal requests.

claim.subtitle: No assets available to claim from this market.

marketWithdrawalRequests.noOutstanding: No outstanding withdrawals from previous cycles.
marketWithdrawalRequests.noOngoing: No ongoing withdrawals in the current cycle.
marketWithdrawalRequests.noClaimable: No claimable withdrawals from previous cycles.

defaults.title: Defaults
defaults.tooltip: The number of markets owned by this borrower in which a penalty fee has applied for more than 90 days.

noInfo.title: Add Borrower Description
noInfo.subtitle: You can't expect anyone to extend credit to you if they don't know who you are.

additionalUrls.title: Additional Links
additionalUrls.subtitle: Additional links that lenders may find useful.

name.title: Legal Name
name.tooltip: If you're called X Capital Fund Ltd but are known as Y, enter the former.
name.helperText: This can only be changed by contacting support.

alias.title: Alias/Trading Name
alias.placeholder: Name by which borrower might be more well known.
alias.tooltip: If you're called X Capital Fund Ltd but are known as Y, enter the latter.
alias.helperText: This can only be changed by contacting support.

description.title: Description
description.placeholder: Description of your business operations, what you aim to borrow for, any external dashboards/information that lenders would find useful etc.

founded.title: Founded
founded.placeholder: Year that the borrowing entity was created.

headquarters.title: Headquarters
headquarters.placeholder: Location of entity headquarters/main place of business.

twitter.title: Twitter/X
twitter.tooltip: Enter a Twitter/X username for the borrower (no @), where applicable.

telegram.title: Telegram
telegram.tooltip: Enter a Telegram username for the borrower (no @), where applicable.

linkedin.title: LinkedIn
linkedin.tooltip: Enter a LinkedIn company page for the borrower (e.g. wildcat-labs), where applicable.

entityKind.title: Entity Legal Form
entityKind.tooltip: The kind of legal entity that is registered in the selected jurisdiction.

private.title: Borrower Legal Information
private.subtitle: Entity details used to pre-populate template loan agreements for markets you create.

address.title: Entity Registered Address
address.helperText: This address will not be private even prior to market deployment.

email.title: Email
email.helperText: This email will be shown to lenders that wish to be added to closed markets.

buttons.login: Sign a message before submitting changes to profile

policy.label: Market Policy
policy.glossary: Rules defining loan type (open/fixed term) and access requirements.

name.label: Policy Name
name.glossary: Unique identifier for this reusable market rule-set.

kyc.label: Onboarding Preferences
kyc.placeholder: Select the mechanism enabling lenders to join your market.

earlyClose.label: Permit Early Termination
earlyClose.explainer: Allows you to terminate a market before it reaches maturity.

reduceExpiration.label: Permit Maturity Reduction
reduceExpiration.explainer: Allows you to reduce the maturity of a fixed term market.

asset.label: Underlying Asset
asset.glossary: The ERC-20 token used for all transactions in the market, such as Wrapped Ether (WETH) or USDC.

tokenName.label: Market Token Name
tokenName.glossary: A descriptive name for the market tokens lenders receive, representing their share in the market.

tokenSymbol.label: Market Token Symbol
tokenSymbol.glossary: A short identifier prefix, such as "abcWETH" for the tokens lenders receive in the market.

mla.label: Master Loan Agreement
mla.glossary: A legally binding document that defines the terms, obligations, and penalties for borrowers and lenders in the market.

maxCapacity.label: Maximum Borrowing Capacity
maxCapacity.glossary: The maximum limit of funds that borrowers can access in the market.

baseAPR.label: Base APR
baseAPR.glossary: The fixed annual percentage rate (excluding any protocol fees) that borrowers pay for assets within the market.

penaltyAPR.label: Penalty APR
penaltyAPR.glossary: An additional interest rate charged if the market remains delinquent - failing to maintain required reserves - after the grace period has elapsed.

ratio.label: Reserve Ratio
ratio.glossary: A required percentage of market funds that must remain liquid and unavailable for borrowing.

minDeposit.label: Minimum Deposit
minDeposit.glossary: The minimum amount of the underlying asset required to participate as a lender in the market.

restrictDeposits.label: Restrict Deposits
restrictDeposits.explainer: Restricts deposits to approved participants based on eligibility criteria.
restrictDeposits.glossary: Restrict Deposits limits who can contribute assets to the market. Eligibility criteria, such as identity verification, membership, or specific approvals, ensure that only qualified participants are allowed to deposit funds.

disableTransfers.label: Disable Transfers
disableTransfers.explainer: Blocks the transfer of market tokens between participants, keeping them tied to their original holder.
disableTransfers.glossary: Disable Transfers stops the movement of tokens representing deposits or loans within the market. This ensures that tokens remain with their original holders and are not traded or moved between accounts, maintaining control and security. Transfers to the market starting withdrawal requests are not disabled.

restrictWithdrawals.label: Restrict Withdrawals
restrictWithdrawals.explainer: [RECOMMENDED] Restricts withdrawals to users who meet the defined market access criteria, such as holding valid credentials or being on an approved list of participants.
restrictWithdrawals.glossary: Restricts the ability to withdraw funds to users who meet market access criteria. These criteria include possession of valid deposit credentials, approval through a role provider, or other borrower-defined conditions. By enforcing such restrictions, the market ensures only eligible participants can withdraw, maintaining order and compliance with its operational framework​.

restrictTransfers.label: Restrict Transfers
restrictTransfers.explainer: Allows transfers of market tokens only to users who satisfy the market’s policy-defined access conditions, such as holding valid credentials or being on an approved list.
restrictTransfers.glossary: Restrict Transfers ensures that market tokens can only be transferred between participants who meet the specific access requirements set by the market’s policy. These conditions may include holding approved deposit credentials or satisfying other borrower-defined qualifications. This restriction helps maintain compliance with the policy and supports secure market operations​​.

grace.label: Grace Period Duration
grace.glossary: The duration borrowers have to resolve reserve deficiencies or correct delinquency in the market before penalties take effect.

wdCycle.label: Withdrawal Cycle Duration
wdCycle.glossary: A fixed period during which withdrawal requests are grouped and processed.

confirm.title: Confirmation
confirm.alert: Once created, the only adjustable market parameters are Base APR, Minimum Deposit and Maximum Capacity.
confirm.alertFee:
A protocol fee will be in place on this market, currently defined as a 5% additional rate on your Base APR, whatever you set it as.

Please factor this in, and be prepared to maintain sufficient market reserves over time: failure to do so can result in delinquency.
confirm.alertReduction: You have enabled Permit Maturity Reduction on this market. You will be able to reduce the time until withdrawal requests are permitted.

success.title: Market created!
success.message: Market successfully created: the rest is up to you!

error.title: Oops! Something went wrong!
error.message: Can you reach out to us and tell us how you got here?
